description: Non-material amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/03121/FUL (Erection of 9no. dwellings comprising of 6 x 2bedroom apartments within a two storey block including accommodation within the roof and 3x 4bedroom semidetatched houses. Layout associated works with vehicle access gate and 11no. carparking spaces) dated 24/02/2020. Amendment to drawings to facilitate alterations to the approved flats increasing the size of the two rear facing 2nd floor balconies and improve the area of amenity space.
